explanation: [0-0] A man with grayish-white hair is standing next to a gray table, looking at the camera with a smile. He's holding a black square box with the white YouTube logo printed on it. The background is a kitchen, with cabinets visible in the back.

[0-6] He then opens the box, revealing a shiny square box. The scene cuts to the man wearing black gloves and placing three golden baking pans on the gray table. He pours flour into the first pan. Then, he takes an egg in each hand and cracks them open, with some egg liquid already present in the second pan. Next, he picks up two containers and pours breadcrumbs into the third pan. He then dips the square box into the flour in the first pan, followed by the egg wash, and finally the breadcrumbs. He grabs some breadcrumbs and sprinkles them onto the breaded square box.
